Please draft an email of his actions and current status. Also include what plans were in motion to move him to a

------- Original message -------
From: Ray Ormon [b(6); [b(7)(C)] @bop.gov>
Date: 7/23/19 11:46 AM (GMT-05:00)
To: Lamine N'Diaye <Lndiaye@bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Epstein

>>> "Ray Ormond" 07/23/2019 11:46 >>>
Lamine - The memo is very confusing. Please draft an email of his actions and current status. Also include what plans were in motion to move him to a

>>> "Lamine N'Diaye" [b(6); [b(7)(C)] bop.gov > 07/23/2019 11:12 >>>
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email chain with redactions. The content is related to an individual named Epstein and involves communication between officials at MCC New York and BOP.
